products.title: Smith & Wesson Model 103 Chain Link Handcuff
products.body_html:
Apprehend with authority - precision-engineered cuffs for uncompromising restraint.

The Smith & Wesson Model 103 Chain Link Handcuffs are purpose-built for the demanding environments faced by law enforcement and security professionals. Constructed from corrosion-resistant stainless steel, these handcuffs can withstand punishing salt water and humid conditions without compromising integrity. The double-locking slot mechanism prevents further tightening, making them harder to shim and ensuring secure restraint. With 22 locking positions and a maximum opening of 8.10", they accommodate various wrist sizes for versatile application. The included keys and instructions ensure seamless operation, while the 10-ounce weight strikes a balance between durability and portability.

Expertly engineered by Smith & Wesson, a trusted name in tactical equipment, these handcuffs epitomise the quality and dependability required in high-stakes situations. When duty calls, rely on the Model 103 Chain Link Handcuffs to deliver uncompromising performance and control.
